bill.summary:
Prohibiting Aid for Recipients Ignoring Science Act of 2017 or the PARIS Act of 2017
This bill amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to prohibit property owned or operated by the President or a relative from qualifying for premium rate subsidies through the National Flood Insurance Program.
